title: Townhouse for Rent (3 bd, 2.5 ba)
description:
This lovely town home is in the sought after community of Whiteland Woods in West Chester, PA. It offers 3 bedrooms,2-1/2 baths, a full, finished Basement with a separate possible office, craft room or gym. This home is complete with an attached 2 car garage.
The entire main level has hardwood floors. The Family Room has soaring ceilings, a wall of windows & a gas fireplace. Sliding glass doors lead to the newly stained deck.
The beautiful Kitchen has gas cooking, an island, loads of storage, all newly installed appliances and a separate eating area.
The second floor boasts a Primary Bedroom with walk-in closet, an additional closet and has en suite ceramic tiled Bathroom with soaking tub, double bowl sinks and stall shower.
Two additional Bedrooms and a full Bathroom finish off the second level which overlooks the Family Room.
The whole house was freshly painted last year and is bright and airy in all seasons.
There is a small piece of land next to the entrance for summer gardening. The backyard is full of green.
A Community Hall, Clubhouse, Gym, Swimming Pool, Jacuzzi, Infant Pool, Tennis court, Tot lots and sidewalks for an evening or anytime stroll are amenities this neighborhood offers.
Acclaimed West Chester Schools are here.
Access to PA Turnpike, Rts 202, 30 & 100 not to mention limitless shopping, restaurants, malls, and grocery stores.
This neighborhood has access to the bus line and two Septa train stations within 1 mile. One of those is the Amtrak station and can be used for commuting to Philly and New York.

title: What a lovely setting! Steps from the Schuykill River and Trail
description:
2429 Locust St, Philadelphia, PA 19103
What a lovely setting! Steps from the Schuykill River and Trail, on a quiet, shaded section of Fitler Square stands Locust Point, a 110-unit structure converted from a bible factory to condominiums by Carl Dranoff in 2007. There is so much to like here. You’re removed from the hustle and bustle of Rittenhouse Square, yet you can easily walk or bike to the attractions there or in Center City. Equally close are Penn and Drexel, accessible via the Walnut St Bridge less than a block away. ENTRANCE: One enters the building through two doors accessible using a fob into an attractive, contemporary 2-story lobby with seating areas and floor to ceiling windows. Off the lobby is a covered, outside seating area. At the back of the lobby is the gym. There is onsite management by Reinhold Residential during the week in an office just inside the entrance. UNIT ENTRANCE: Enter into a small vestibule with coat closet and the bathroom which also contains the washer/dryer. Steps on the left lead to the lofted bedroom. As one proceeds down the hallway, one notices the beautiful dark hardwood floor and is struck by the spacious feeling created by the high ceilings and light coming in from the oversize windows. It’s also very quiet due to the soundproofed walls of the building. LIVING AREA: The open floor plan allows light to stream through the space and is well suited to entertaining. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, handsome cherry cabinets offering plenty of storage space, granite counter tops and an island with seating for four. There’s plenty of room for a couch, TV and desk in the sitting area and a beautiful view of the trees lining Locust St out the window. NEARBY: The Schuykill River Park is a block away and offers a dog park, tennis courts, basketball courts and a playground. AMENITIES: There is a gym, a package room and a fenced dog run.

Our beautiful Apartment 208 is located within the fully renovated Croydon Hall located in Walnut Hill. private tour of our available floor plans!

title: 2-bedroom apartment
description:
Hello,
We're just completing renovations of this 2-bedroom apartment in Germantown. In the photos you may notice a few incomplete details, which will be taken care of over the next two weeks!
Very important note about this apartment--
Because of the third floor, there are slanted ceilings in some rooms. The bathroom has been particularly affected by this. The slant is right above the tub/shower. I'm 5'6" and when I stand in there, there is just a couple inches above my head. To get under the showerhead I would need to bend a bit.
*** So this apartment is best suited for someone on the shorter side! ***
THE APARTMENT AND COMPANY:
Located on the 100 block of East Washington Lane
Will be ready for a July 1st move-in. (Maybe a little sooner)
Brand new floors, fresh paint
Kitchen has two windows and plenty of room for a dining table
Apartment is on the 3rd floor in a 3-unit house. There is no elevator.
One bedroom is quite large. The second bedroom and the living room are on the smaller side, used to be one combined room and the prior owner built a wall down the center.
The price includes water only. Tenants are responsible for their own electric and gas. The heat is gas.
Laundry is located at the 1st floor rear of the house, shared with the tenants of the other two apartments.
There is a yard for all tenants to share.
Pets are ok, small refundable deposit required.
No smoking.
We are a small company, management and owners all live close by in Germantown. Maintenance and repairs are done with independent  contractors.
First, last, and security required to sign lease/receive keys.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
We always prefer to rent to folks who are already part of the community, so if you're in Germantown, we'd love to keep you here.
We look for income to be close to 3 times the amount of rent, because we want to  know that you can afford it. (This isn't a hard rule, but an estimate) So here that would mean income of around $3300/month. We request income documentation to demonstrate this.
We want tenants who will be considerate of their neighbors in terms of sound and how they use their space. There's not a ton of insulation between each level.
INSTRUCTIONS:
If this sounds like you, please send a message. You will be asked a few questions prior to the scheduling of a showing.  Know that we do not waste time showing our apartments to as many people  as possible. So if you meet the criteria, are interested in renting, and you fill out the  application, you are not wasting your time.
There is no application fee.
You're less likely to get a response if you just ask me if the apartment is available. It's best to give more of an introduction about yourself, your timeline, etc.

title: *Welcome to the Fairmount home of your dreams!~**
description: Welcome to the Fairmount home of your dreams! Located on a quiet tree-lined street in the heart of Fairmount, this brownstone triplex has been renovated from top to bottom. The Penthouse - Unit 3 features two spacious bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Enter directly into the kitchen which features powder blue custom cabinets with polished chrome hardware, Calcutta Vegas quartz countertops and backsplash, massive farmhouse sink, and brand-new Samsung stainless-steel appliances. Just off the kitchen is the extra wide, open concept living and dining area. The living room also features a unique shiplap bump-out adorned against exposed brick, perfect for mounting a TV or artwork. The stackable GE laundry center is located just off the living room. At the front of the property is the primary bedroom with a gorgeous feature wall with custom sconces, en-suite bathroom with tub, and barn door leading to the custom designed closet. Tucked away in the front corner of the primary is a custom built-in nook, complete with extra drawers and storage space. At the rear of the property is another large bedroom with a spacious closet and 3 windows, allowing the natural light to pour right in. The Penthouse has exceptionally tall ceiling heights north of 11 feet. Head upstairs to the completely private full building sized roof deck (almost 1,000 sq ft!), showcasing unobstructed views of Philadelphia that will take your breath away. The roof deck is accessed through a private pilot house with additional windows allowing more natural light to flow through the unit. Central air, white oak hardwood floors, and so much more make this unit absolutely remarkable! The front entry doors have been restored to pay homage to the history of the property, and the common entryway has been tiled to perfection. Each unit comes with its own separate Ring Doorbell for convenience and ease. Super low estimated HOA fees of approximately $132 per month. Last but not least, this condo comes with a fully approved 10-year rehab tax abatement. Rarely does a home with this design aesthetic come to the market at such a competitive price. Schedule your showing today before it is too late!
